messages.title: Vote for what you believe in
messages.content: We want to live in a fairer society, with real democracy, where our surroundings look and feel as though people are a valued part of it.

messages.title: A Living Wage for All
messages.content: Too many people are doing real, hard work every day but still live in poverty.

messages.title: Protect our NHS
messages.content: Our NHS must remain a public service, free at the point of use, and not be broken up and sold off.

messages.title: A Million New Jobs
messages.content: We will invest in a Green New Deal to create a million new jobs and train people to do them.

messages.title: FAIRS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Chris Bluemel and the Green Party are standing up for FAIRNESS in society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase minimum wage to a living wage; end wage discrimination for younger people.
Invest in a Green New Deal to provide a million new jobs that will enhance sustainability.
Ensure the NHS remains a public service, free at the point of use, without privatization.

issues.economy: We will invest in a Green New Deal to create a million new jobs and train people to do them.
issues.health: Our NHS must remain a public service, free at the point of use...
